label: Density
description: density preservation: correlation of local radius with the local radii in the original data space

label: NN_Ranking
description: A set of metrics from the pyDRMetrics package.

label: RMSE
description: The root mean squared error between the full (or processed) data matrix and a list of dimensionally-reduced matrices
component_description: The root mean squared error between the full (or processed) data matrix and a list of dimensionally-reduced matrices

label: Trustworthiness
description: To what extent the local structure is retained in a low-dimensional embedding in a value between 0 and 1.
component_description: To what extent the local structure is retained in a low-dimensional embedding in a value between 0 and 1.
